summary: Adds the robes of the mighty necromancer Mannimarco to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds this basic set in the game.

Obtainable with the console commands ( Type "help "Mannimarco"" and then "Player.additem XXX 1" with the items code ) or with Additem menu.

There is light daedric boots, a skeleton hand with a single glove, black and red robes with daedric pauldrons and a large cloak and finally, a whole set of different hoods, with shadows, half or full skulls and stuff like that.

Inspired by this fan art :

[img]https://i.warosu.org/data/tg/img/0212/40/1350965639192.jpg[/img]

I can't find the original author, though :/ All credits belong to him/her.
author: FafnirEtherion
